_sText:
Here is my latest version of my map
**Jb_carceris**

Bz2 version can be found [here](http://www.gamemaps.nl/versluis/cstrike/maps/jb_carceris_beta07.bsp.bz2 "Bz2 Link")

This is just a next version of the BETA, added a few more things (Check changelog) and packed some missing textures.

Note that this is a Beta, next version will be much better. (Will add **HDR** and **bigger lightmaps!**)

In this classic map there can be found:

- Soccer
- Disco
- Pool
 - Waterpolo
 - Diving
- LR
 - Gun Toss
 - Arena
 - Shot 4 Shot
- Yard one
 - Hot Potato
 - 4 in a row
 - Jumping contest
- Yard two

Changelog:

- Added Simon Says
- Enlarged the left yard
- Added more camping spots
- Added a Race
- Added a Jumping Contest
- Added a Big-Jail, which randomly changes (Gun/USP/Nade/Body/Well closes)
- Added a few more areaportals/skip&hints
- Added multiple game modes at soccer (Big Ball/Anti-Gravity/Dodgeball/Regular)
- Adjust Hot Potato, less bugs
- Addedd a skate area (Need feedback at this)
- Changed a few secrets
- Added a few secrets
- Optimized the gameplay

The map itself is fully optimized, and not heavy for any server at all.

For any suggestions or feedback, please reply!
